title: a1278 green light only
message:
I understand this could be a retarded question. I have this a1278 and after a beer spill I only get green light on charger. I did ultrasonic. and thus far when I plug in only the cpu gets very hot. Sorry but I do not have a clue where to start. 
kind regards

title: a1278 green light only
message: Do you get image on the external with the screen disconnected?

title: a1278 green light only
message: What is the board number? Does the fan spin after you connect the power?

title: a1278 green light only
message: yes i do get an image with the internal screen disconnected. I think you meant to say internal that is-

title: a1278 green light only
message: I'm sorry Duke, I do not know how to find the board number. I also do get fan spin. If you can help me to find out how to tell you about the board number-I am really sorry to have to ask you that. I did a brief google search but didn't seem to come up with an answer. My apologies.

title: a1278 green light only
message: So the board is working just no image. Is it just the backlight not coming on? Check with a flashlight behind the Apple logo and see if you can see the blinking question mark after 30 seconds. Put the heatsink back on the CPU!

title: a1278 green light only
message: I am now getting display on internal lcd. I do not get a charging light however. It does show that it is charging on the display but no amber light on magsafe. the battery is 97% and it says "battery is charged" I am going to let it drain some and report back. Please let me know of anything else I can or should do. I really appreciate it!

title: a1278 green light only
message: heatsink is on but thermal compound got cleaned out more or less. I will have to go buy some now. be back in about 20 minutes.

title: a1278 green light only
message: also something did smell a bit of a burn now, laptop was on about 10 minutes with heatsink but very little compound if any.

title: a1278 green light only
message: is the board number the emc number? if so 2554 is the one i have

title: a1278 green light only
message: Looks like everything is alright except the keyboard and power button. I will replace those tonight and report back. Thanks again!

title: a1278 green light only
message: Consider yourself very lucky then if it is just the keyboard.
